bullets: Designed and developed responsive websites for 5 small business clients using React and Tailwind CSS, increasing their web traffic by an average of 20%
Integrated Shopify APIs for a local boutique, enabling them to launch an online store and generate $5k sales in the first month
Maintained and updated WordPress sites for clients, ensuring security patches and plugin compatibility
Managed a portfolio of 50+ high-value accounts, achieving a 95% retention rate through proactive communication
Collaborated with technical support teams to resolve complex user issues, developing a strong interest in software troubleshooting
Automated weekly reporting using Excel macros, saving the team 5 hours of manual work per week

projects.title: Neighborhood Marketplace
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform allowing users to list and buy local items. Features include user authentication, image upload, and search filtering. Deployed on Heroku.
bullets: Built full-stack e-commerce platform with authentication and search filtering

projects.title: TaskFlow Manager
projects.description: Trello-clone project management tool. Implemented real-time updates using Firebase Firestore and a drag-and-drop interface for task cards.
bullets: Created Trello-clone with real-time updates and drag-and-drop interface
